entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Flurries over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:27 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening except a few flurries over higher terrain. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 11:27 AM PST Tuesday 31 January 2023
